thread.section_title: Airyhair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airyhair | airyhair.com
thread.title: Cierra Grayson

author: Cierra Grayson
title: Cierra Grayson
text: Seriously the best hair ever for the best price! The color and length were just as expected and the quality of the hair and the clips were great! It did take a little longer to ship then expected but they contacted me right away and answered any questions very quickly! Great customer service and quality made it worth the wait! I will definitely be ordering more hair in a few months! Defiantly recommend!
